entry.title: Gotham Nights
entry.summary:
Author: Apom1175

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,343Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: One late night, like any other, Jason climbs in the window of your shared apartment, his eyes distant and pit green, his hands bloodied, and, like any other night, you are there to keep him together.
